subject: Fantasy Sports
Gambling
Shutdowns (Institutional)
lead_paragraph: The two largest daily fantasy websites were granted a stay by the Appellate Division of the New York State Supreme Court while they try to fend off a challenge from the state’s attorney general.
snippet: The two largest daily fantasy websites were granted a stay by the Appellate Division of the New York State Supreme Court while they try to fend off a challenge from the state’s attorney general.
